summary:
- **Performance Highlights (30 June 2025):**  
  - **Monthly return:** +3.6% (net of fees).  
  - **YTD return:** +24.9% (1-year), +26.9% pa (3-year).  
  - **NTA per share:** AUD 2.1422 (after tax).  

- **Top Holdings & Key Movers:**  
  - **Spectris (London-listed):** +92% in June due to takeover bids (85% premium).  
  - **Copper stocks (Freeport-McMoRan, Teck Resources):** +13% and +9% on supply constraints and EV demand.  
  - **Newmont (gold miner):** +11% on geopolitical tensions (gold price ~US$3,400/oz).  
  - **Pernod Ricard/Heineken:** Declined on weak China demand and inventory concerns.  

- **Portfolio Metrics:**  
  - **Net equity exposure:** 100% (111% long, -11% short).  
  - **Top themes:** European banks (32%), industrial metals (19%).  
  - **Geographic exposure:** Europe (42%), North America (37%).  

- **Liquidity/Dividends:**  
  - **Gross dividend yield (guidance):** 6.0% pa (fully franked, subject to conditions).  

No trading or capital markets actions announced (monthly performance update only).
